page.title: 07HOTEL INTERVIEW
page.content: The Park Hotel is a 3 star hotel situated at the roundabout at the end of Beach Road.It is one of the main hotels in Tynemouth.The manager is Mr.Eric,aged 50.It is he whom we interviewed on the 21st June. Mr.Eric looks personally on his 90 hour a week job.He lives in the hotel which is unusual.The hotel has 5 bars,27 bedrooms and can have 450 people for tea.When Mr.Eric left school he came straight to the Park Hotel to work. An average day:early morning call-7:15,dressed and meditated by-9:00,breakfast-10:00,checks business and smooth running of hotel by-2:00pm when he has his lunch,counts takings,"sells" hotel by 'phone by-6:00pm,meditation-7:30pm then dinner and bed by-2:30am.He gets 2 days off a week.
